name: tdm
description: class describing a time dependent mass force model

properties.name: gravityForceInB
properties.description: Total gravity force contribution given in the coordinate system of the body that owns the tdm force model.

properties.name: massMatrixInB
properties.description: Total mass matrix contribution given in the coordinate system of the body that owns the tdm force model.

properties.name: cogInB
properties.description: Position of the center of gravity given in the coordinate system of the body that owns the tdm force model.
